tags.name:
grid-plate
`A grid plate based on a layout that manipulates it.`
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `grid-plate`
 * @customElement grid-plate
 * `A grid plate based on a layout that manipulates it.`
 * @demo demo/index.html
 */

attributes.name: breakpoint-sm
attributes.description: Custom small breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

attributes.name: breakpoint-md
attributes.description: Custom medium breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

attributes.name: breakpoint-lg
attributes.description: Custom large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

attributes.name: breakpoint-xl
attributes.description: Custom extra-large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

attributes.name: columns
attributes.description: number of columns at this layout / responsive size

attributes.name: disable-responsive
attributes.description: disables responsive layouts for HAX preview

attributes.name: edit-mode
attributes.description:
If the grid plate is in a state where its items
can be modified as far as order or column placement.
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
       * If the grid plate is in a state where its items
       * can be modified as far as order or column placement.
       */

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description:
an object with a layout's column sizes
at the current responsive width
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
       * an object with a layout's column sizes
       * at the current responsive width
       */

attributes.name: layouts
responsive-size
attributes.description: Responsive size as `xs`, `sm`, `md`, `lg`, or `xl`

attributes.name: active-item
attributes.description: Track active item

attributes.name: column-widths
attributes.description: name of selected layout

properties.name: breakpointSm
properties.description: Custom small breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

properties.name: breakpointMd
properties.description: Custom medium breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

properties.name: breakpointLg
properties.description: Custom large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

properties.name: breakpointXl
properties.description: Custom extra-large breakpoint for the layouts; only updated on attached

properties.name: columns
properties.description: number of columns at this layout / responsive size

properties.name: disableResponsive
properties.description: disables responsive layouts for HAX preview

properties.description:
If the grid plate is in a state where its items
can be modified as far as order or column placement.
properties.jsDoc:

       * If the grid plate is in a state where its items
       * can be modified as far as order or column placement.
       */

properties.description:
an object with a layout's column sizes
at the current responsive width

       * an object with a layout's column sizes
       * at the current responsive width
       */

properties.name: layouts
responsiveSize
properties.description: Responsive size as `xs`, `sm`, `md`, `lg`, or `xl`

properties.name: activeItem
properties.description: Track active item

properties.name: columnWidths
properties.description: name of selected layout
